OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: Get Asset Viewer Line Items

omniProcessElements.name: getAllAssetsAPI
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "currentPage" : "%currentPage%", "fields" : "vlocity_cmt__OrderProductId__c,Description,vlocity_cmt__ContractId__c,vlocity_cmt__OneTimeTotal__c,Status,vlocity_cmt__EffectiveOneTimeTotal__c,vlocity_cmt__ServiceAccountId__r.Name,vlocity_cmt__RecurringCharge__c,Product2.vlocity_cmt__VersionLabel__c,vlocity_cmt__PriceListId__r.Name,vlocity_cmt__BillingAccountId__r.Name,vlocity_cmt__ServicePointId__r.Name", "filters" : "AccountId:%accountId%,vlocity_cmt__Action__c:!Disconnect%filterString%", "offsetSize" : "%offset%", "pagesize" : "%pagesize%", "promotionCondition" : "=CONCAT('(AppliedPromotionId__r.CancellationDate__c = null OR AppliedPromotionId__r.CancellationDate__c > ',%SetAPIValues:DateTimeNow%,')')", "query" : "%query%", "searchBy" : "%searchBy%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "CpqAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "getAllAssets", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: transformData
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "response" : "%getAllAssetsAPI%" }, "additionalOutput" : { "filterString" : "%filterString%", "loadMoreQuery" : "%query%", "query" : "" }, "bundle" : "CPQAssetViewerResponseTransformer", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataMapperTransformAction1", "responseJSONNode" : "response", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
